Message module¶

class Message.Message(Log)¶

Bases: object

Handles all the Messages of the Conversation between the users

MSG_LEN = 2048¶
addMessagetoConversations(user, text, time, whoSendIt)¶

creates a dictionary from the passed data and inserts it in the Conversation from the local user and the passed user

Parameters:
  • user (String) – the user relative to the active conversation
  • text (String) – the text of the message
  • time (String) – the moment when the message has been sent
  • whoSendIt (Boolean) – specify if the user send it or the local client send it
createMessageJson(text, time, sender, logout)¶

Create the dictionary with the passed data

Parameters:
  • text (String) – the text of the message
  • time (String) – the moment when the message is sent
  • sender (String) – The sender of the message
  • logout (Boolean) – specify if it is a logout message or not
Return type:

String
Returns:

The json string containing the dictionary
loadConversations(username)¶

load the conversations for the local user passed as username

Parameters:username (String) – the local user
retrieveAllConversations()¶

Used to get all the conversations

Return type:Dict
Returns:The dictionary containing all the conversations with all the users Conversations[user][index][text] Conversations[user][index][time] Conversations[user][index][whoSendIt]
retrieveConversation(user)¶

Used to get the conversation with the specified user

Parameters:user (String) – the user of the wanted conversation
Return type:Dict or Int
Returns:0 if that conversation does not exist, otherwise the dictionary containing all the conversations with all the users Dict[index][text] Dict[index][time] Dict[index][whoSendIt]
saveConversations(username, ordinatedUserList=None)¶

Save all the conversations in a ordinated way, if there is the ordinatedUserList, for the local client, passed as username

Parameters:
  • username (String) – The local user
  • ordinatedUserList (List or None) – None if it is not present an ordinated list, otherwise List<String>
